mapper.select: SELECT POSTDATE, ROUND(((I.RELPRICE-T.SOLDPRICE)/I.RELPRICE * 100), 1) AS FALLRATE FROM TOTAL_IPHONE T JOIN INFO I ON T.KRNAME = I.KRNAME WHERE KRNAME LIKE #{krname} AND GB LIKE #{gb} AND CONDITIONS LIKE CONCAT(#{conditions}, '%') AND CHANGES LIKE #{changes} AND CONTRACT LIKE #{contract} AND GURANTEE LIKE #{gurantee} AND SOLD LIKE CONCAT(#{sold}, '%') GROUP BY POSTDATE
SELECT DISTINCT(GB) FROM TOTAL_IPHONE WHERE KRNAME = #{krname}
SELECT DISTINCT(CONDITIONS) FROM TOTAL_IPHONE WHERE KRNAME = #{krname} AND GB = #{gb}
SELECT DISTINCT(CHANGES) FROM TOTAL_IPHONE WHERE KRNAME = #{krname} AND GB = #{gb} AND CONDITIONS = #{conditions}
SELECT DISTINCT(CONTRACT) FROM TOTAL_IPHONE WHERE KRNAME = #{krname} AND GB = #{gb} AND CHANGES = #{changes} AND CONDITIONS = #{conditions}
SELECT DISTINCT(GUARANTEE) FROM TOTAL_IPHONE WHERE KRNAME = #{krname} AND GB = #{gb} AND CHANGES = #{changes} AND CONDITIONS = #{conditions} AND CONTRACT = #{contract} AND
SELECT DISTINCT(SOLD) FROM TOTAL_IPHONE WHERE KRNAME = #{krname} AND GB = #{gb} AND CHANGES = #{changes} AND CONDITIONS = #{conditions} AND CONTRACT = #{contract} AND GUARANTEE = #{guarantee}
